Metadata.Title: CVE-2024-0727 affecting package openssl for versions less than 1.1.1k-29
Metadata.Description: CVE-2024-0727 affecting package openssl for versions less than 1.1.1k-29. A patched version of the package is available.

Criterion.Comment: Package openssl is earlier than 1.1.1k-29, affected by CVE-2024-0727
